data.message: Okay my dear sweet Stans trying again. Many have told me to ask for help. Here it goes, TO MY DEAR MR. MATHERS, can u please reserve me tickets to do the whole meet and greet. I will pay you back one paycheck at a time til they reinstate my social security disability then i can pay you back faster I promise. I have waited for 11 yrs because of my multiple sclerosis, miss u the first time cause of diagnoses and seizures in the hot sun. This time screw all that I want to be there, kick MS in the ass and say F**k my seizures, cause I have waited to long. I need your help and will continue to ask til I get a response  Again sorry my sweet Stans, thank you for all the luv and support. Sweet Dreams cause I'm wishing for mine to come true.

replies.message: What meet and greet? Where and when??
